content.raw:
The laser test is failing. I'm working on a fix.
~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/LaserTest.LaserBox/1
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11369
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.187
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.08 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/test/integration/laser.cc:223: Failure
The difference between raySensor->GetRange(mid) and expectedRangeAtMidPoint is 0.032520155018669117, which exceeds 1e-5, where
raySensor->GetRange(mid) evaluates to 0.53252015501866912,
expectedRangeAtMidPoint evaluates to 0.5, and
1e-5 evaluates to 1.0000000000000001e-05.
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/test/integration/laser.cc:224: Failure
The difference between raySensor->GetRange(0) and expectedRangeAtMidPoint is 0.032513700277104096, which exceeds 1e-5, where
raySensor->GetRange(0) evaluates to 0.5325137002771041,
expectedRangeAtMidPoint evaluates to 0.5, and
1e-5 evaluates to 1.0000000000000001e-05.
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/LaserTest.LaserBox/1, where GetParam() = "bullet" (1733 ms)
~~~
